selectedVerses.text: And the cherubim mounted up. These were the living creatures that I saw by the Chebar canal.
In the thirtieth year, in the fourth month, on the fifth day of the month, as I was among the exiles by the Chebar canal, the heavens were opened, and I saw visions of God.
These were the living creatures that I saw underneath the God of Israel by the Chebar canal; and I knew that they were cherubim.
the word of the LORD came to Ezekiel the priest, the son of Buzi, in the land of the Chaldeans by the Chebar canal, and the hand of the LORD was upon him there.
And I saw in the vision; and when I saw, I was in Susa the capital, which is in the province of Elam. And I saw in the vision, and I was at the Ulai canal.
